Harbison. The libretto, also by Harbison, was adapted from the novel The Great 
Gatsby by F. Scott Fitzgerald. Additional popular song lyrics were by Murray 
Horwitz. ... The Great Gatsby had its premiere performance on December 20, 
1999.
